Thanks you every one for your interest, the books have sold.

best wishes

Rich Turner

Richard Turner wrote:

>greetings all, I have a nearly full set of Haynes catalogues available. 
>these are the highly important and sort after auction catalogues from 
>the early to mid 1980's. There are volumes 1,2,3,4,6,7,8,9,10. All cover 
>Tsuba, Kodogu and other Japanese Art including Swords, Armour, Guns, 
>Woodblocks and more. Most are in excellent condition, 3 of the books are 
>in not so great condition. book 1 is in slightly worse condition that 
>the good books, catalogue 9 has come apart at the spline, and catalogue 
>10 has been heavily marked in auction with a pen. Other than that, they 
>are a great source of information for the collector of Kodogu and a must 
>have.
>
>I am asking US$200 plus postage.
>
>The set weighs in at 4.5 Kilos as a whole, I may also sell them 
>individually if no wants the whole set.
>
>contact me ** <mailto:ikkanshi@...> if you are interested.
>
>Cheers
>
>Richard Turner
>
>
>
>
